title: string: UnreadRune does not return error after Seek
body:
What does 'go version' print?
go version devel +2bce43d48503 Mon Mar 17 12:07:30 2014 -0700 linux/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?
http://play.golang.org/p/6H5qCjvex2

Reader.UnreadRune should return an error if previous operation is not ReadRune. However,
it doesn't return an error if previous operation is Seek.
